title: HelpGavin.com
copy: HelpGavin.com is a fundraising website built to raise money for a dog's medical expenses. The website aims to provide visitors with a seamless experience to learn about Gavin's story, view pictures, and make donations.

title: No Bones About It
alt: No Bones About It Landing Page
copy: No Bones About It is a digital platform created to showcase a vegan culinary business. The application provides users with a visually pleasing gallery of vegan dishes, social media links for further engagement, and essential information about the company.

title: Pokémon Click Quest
copy: Pokémon Click Quest is a memory game built to test your recollection skills and love for Pokémon. Click on different Pokémon without clicking the same one twice.

title: IdentiWrite
copy: IdentiWrite.com serves as the digital hub for a family-owned dental copywriting agency. Specializing in content marketing and search engine optimization, the agency helps dentists acquire new patients. The website offers a blog, company information, and a way for potential clients to get in touch via contact forms.

title: Dragon Ball Brain Battle
alt: Dragon Ball Brain Battle Landing Page
copy: Dragon Ball Brain Battle is a quiz game that tests your knowledge of the iconic anime series Dragon Ball Z. Upon completion, the game provides a detailed breakdown of your performance, including the number of questions answered correctly, incorrectly, and those left unanswered.

title: Gif Fetcher
copy: This Giphy API Website offers a simple and intuitive platform for users to search and browse GIFs. Tapping into the power of the Giphy API, the website delivers a wide range of GIFs based on user queries. The interface incorporates retro video game styling, adding a unique and nostalgic touch to the user experience.
